summary: the fast-casual chain will work with the postmates app to begin offering delivery for online and mobile orders in 67 cities . the app hires independent contractors who drive their own cars in a similar model to uber taxis . chipotle is thought to have turned down previous offers of collaboration with third-party delivery services .

explain: The core idea of the given aspect is that Chipotle has recently started collaborating with Postmates, a food delivery platform, to provide delivery services for Chipotle's online and mobile orders in 67 cities. The collaboration will involve charging customers a service fee of 9% on their delivery bill, in addition to distance-based fees, which will be based on the distance between the restaurant and the customer's location. This partnership is crucial for Chipotle as it has previously declined offers of collaboration with third-party delivery services.
